history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: fmap_bound. qsimpl time: 1 use: fmap_bound. qsimpl time: 1 use: fmap_bound.

exceptions.tactic: apply fmap_bound in Hf as [m Hm].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> nat -> Prop), (forall x : nat, x < n -> exists y, P x y) -> exists m : nat, forall x : nat, x < n -> exists y : nat, y < m /\\ P x y" on hypothesis of type "forall x : nat, x < n -> exists y, P x y".

exceptions.tactic: apply (fmap_reifier_t X (fun x y => y < m /\ P x y) n).
exceptions.exn: The reference m was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: assert (exists y, i < m /\ P i y) as [y [Hym HPi]] by (apply Hm; assumption).
exceptions.exn: The reference i was not found in the current environment.
The reference y was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

exceptions.tactic: destruct (fmap_reifier_t X (fun x y => y < m /\ P x y) n _) as [f Hf'].
exceptions.exn: The reference m was not found in the current environment.
The reference f was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hf' was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: apply Hm in Hx as [y0 Hy0].

exceptions.exn: The reference Hy was not found in the current environment.
The reference y0 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros HX Hf. apply fmap_bound in Hf as [m Hm]. apply (fmap_reifier_t X (fun x y => y < m /\ P x y) n). intros i Hi. assert (exists y, i < m /\ P i y) as [y [Hym HPi]] by (apply Hm; assumption). refine (exist _ y _). split; auto. destruct (fmap_reifier_t X (fun x y => y < m /\ P x y) n _) as [f Hf']. exists (fun x => proj1_sig (f x _)). intros x Hx. specialize (Hf' x Hx) as [Hy _]. apply Hm in Hx as [y0 Hy0]. destruct Hy as [_ HP]. apply Eqdep_dec.inj_right_pair with (y := y0); auto.
